Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Usa ne mathe ti'uri'am carha'i'am ate muha phera li'a
Isa gala la'i ki usa de kaula anham a'i'a
Ate tuhanu ki pata ki uha sudhara jave
Jam uha upadesa nu sune ate upadesa usa de kama a jave
Jihara bada laparavahi varatada hai
Tusim usa di cita vica pa'e rahide ho
Halanki jekara uha na sudhare tam tuhade ute usa di ko'i zimevari nahim
Ate jihara bada tuhade kaula bhajada ho'i'a a'unda hai
Ate uha darada hai
Tam tusim usa nala laparavahi varatade ho
Kade vi nahim, iha tam ika upadesa hai
So jihara cahe usa nu yada kare
Uha ajihe satikarayoga sahifi'am (gratham) vica hai
Jihare sresata ate pavitara hana
Likhana vali'am de hatham vica
Izatadara ate neka
Bura hove manukha da, uha kiho jiha akritaghana (na-sukara) hai
Usa nu alaha ne kisa ciza tom paida kita hai
Ika buda tom usa nu paida kita, phira usa la'i adaza thahira'i'a
Phira usa la'i rasata saukha kara dita
Phira usa nu mauta diti, phira usa nu kabara vica lai gi'a
Phira jadom uha cahega tam usa nu mura jivita kara devega
Kade vi nahim usa ne uha pura nahim' kita, jisa da alaha ne usa nu hukama kita si
So manukha nu cahida hai ki uha apane bhojana nu dekhe
Asim cagi tar'ham pani varasa'i'a
Phira asim dharati nu khasa taura te pari'a
Phira usa vica anaja uga'i'a
Agura ate tarakari'am
Jaituna ate khajura
Ate saghane baga
Fala ate hari'ali
Tuhade ate tuhade pasu'am la'i jivana samagari de rupa vica (iha sara kujha paida kita)
So jadom (ki'amata da) kanam nu bola kara dena vala uha sora hovega
Jisa dina manukha apane bharavam tom (dura) bhajega
Ate apani mam tom ate apane pi'u tom
Ate apani patani ate apane putaram tom
Unham vicom hareka bada nu usa dina ajiha phikara hovega, jihara unham nu dusari'am tom beparavaha kara devega
Kujha cihare usa dina camaka rahe honage
Hasade ho'e ate khusi'am manade ho'e
Ate usa dina kujha cihari'am te dhura miti uda rahi hovegi
Unham ute kalakha cha'i ho'i hovegi
Iha hi loka dhitha avagi'akari hana
